COVID-19 vaccination during pregnancy helps:
Prevent severe illness and death in women who are pregnant.
Protect babies younger than 6 months old
from hospitalization.

safety and effectiveness of COVID-19 vaccines

Do I need to wait after getting a flu vaccine or other vaccine before getting a COVID-19 vaccine?
